title: Ageing better with Dan Buettner
description:
In Episode #134 I sit down with Dan Buettner, best-selling author of The Blue Zones, to chat about longevity lessons from the healthiest and longest living populations on planet Earth. These populations, together described as the 'Blue Zones', being Loma Linda (California), Ikaria (Greece), Nicoya (Costa Rica), Sardinia (Italy) and Okinawa (Japan). When we understand how people in these parts of the world are living we can begin to understand where we may want to adjust our lifestyles. Adjustments that may well lead to the health and longevity that they experience!

Hope you enjoy the episode.
